comment.text: This translation key defines the label for a button that allows users to set the quota per room. The label is used on a form element where users can define their storage limits. It appears in the UI as part of a settings dialog or form page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation 'Quote pro Raum definieren' is not an accurate translation of 'Define quota per room'. 'Quote' refers to a quotation, not a quota. A quota represents a maximum limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Define quota per room -> 'Kontingent pro Raum festlegen' or 'Raumkontingent definieren'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, 'Define quota per room' is better translated as 'Մեկ սենյակի համար քվոտա սահմանել'. The current phrasing sounds slightly awkward in Armenian.

The translation "ルームごとの容量制限を定義する" literally translates to 'Define capacity limits per room'. While close to the original meaning of 'Define quota per room', 'quota' implies a specific, predetermined limit, whereas '容量制限' (capacity limits) is more general.  'Quota' is often used in a more controlled allocation context, which might be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームごとの割り当て量を定義する

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Zdefiniuj limit na pokój' is understandable, a more accurate and natural translation of 'Define quota per room' would be 'Ustal limit na pokój' or 'Określ limit na pokój'. 'Zdefiniuj' implies a more formal or technical definition, which may not be the intended meaning.
While "Stabilire" (establish) is acceptable, "Define" implies a more specific setting or assigning of a limit. "Stabili" is more general.
While 'per sală' is understandable, a more natural Romanian phrasing might use 'pe cameră' or 'pentru cameră'.

The translation "කාමරයකට සලාකය දක්වන්න" (kaamarayakata salaakaya dakkavanna) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Define quota per room." 'Salaakaya' translates to 'salary' or 'allowance,' which is not the intended meaning. It implies defining a salary per room, not a room quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයකට කොට්ටුව පවරාන්න (kaamarayakata kotuwa pavaraanna) - This translates to 'Assign quota per room' or 'Define a quota for each room.'  Alternatively, කාමරයකට ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය දක්වන්න (kaamarayakata ida pramaṇaya dakkavanna) - which means 'Specify the capacity/space per room'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Дефиниши квоту по соби' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Define quota per room'. 'по соби' literally translates to 'per room' but the phrasing is awkward and doesn't fit the context of settings.
While 'Дефиниши квоту по соби' isn't technically *wrong*, using the infinitive form 'Дефинисање' (Defining) sounds more formal and appropriate for a settings panel.

While "设置每个房间的额度" is understandable, a more accurate and natural-sounding translation for "Define quota per room" would be "为每个房间定义配额" or "设置房间配额". "额度" can imply a limit or budget, which might not be the intended meaning of 'quota'.
